original_text: Peres means “separate”. It shows that God has cut your kingdom into two separate parts. He has given it to the people from Media and Persia.’
korean_text: 베레스는 왕의 나라가 나뉘어서 메대와 바사 사람에게 준 바 되었다 함이니이다 하니

sentences.original_text: It shows that God has cut your kingdom
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 하나님이 당신의 왕국을 나누었음을 보여줍니다.

sentences.original_text: He has given it to the people
